alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tishomingo, northeastern Alcorn, southeastern McNairy and southwestern Hardin Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 244 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Selmer, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Selmer, J P Coleman State Park, Pickwick Landing State Park, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Shiloh, Farmington, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Doskie, Pebble Hill, Hamburg, Wenasoga, Bruton Branch, Tulu, Acton and Chewalla. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
